Sing the chorus of a song chosen by the group.
Eat a spoonful of a condiment chosen by the group.
Do a silly dance for 1 minute without music.
Speak in a fake accent for the next 3 rounds.
Let someone draw a mustache on your face with a marker.
Hold an ice cube in your hand until it melts.
Let the group mix a 'mystery drink' for you to take a sip of.
Let the person to your left style your hair however they want.
Bark like a dog every time someone says your name for the next 5 minutes.
Walk like a crab across the room.
Let someone tickle you for 30 Seconds.
Spin around 10 times and try to walk straight.
Let the group ask you 3 personal questions you must answer truthfully.
Act like a chicken for 1 minute.
Stand on one leg for 2 minutes.
Let the group give you a new nickname and you must answer to it.
Talk in a high-pitched voice for the next round.
Talk in a deep voice for the next round.
Let someone write a word on your forehead.
Crawl across the room on all fours.
Smell the shoe of the person to your right.
Let someone feed you a snack without using your hands.
Act like a monkey for 30 Seconds.
Sing everything you say for the next 2 rounds.
Whisper everything you say for the next 2 rounds.
Shout everything you say for the next 2 rounds.
Walk backwards only for the next 2 rounds.
Sit on the floor for the rest of the round.
Give a foot massage to the person on your left.
Let someone sit on your lap for one round.
Act like a chair and let someone sit on you for 30 Seconds.
Hold a wall sit for 1 minute.
Touch your toes and hold for 30 Seconds.
Balance a spoon on your nose for 1 minute.
Make a funny face and hold it until your next turn.
Pretend to be a waiter/waitress and take orders.
Hug the person to your right for 1 minute.
Hold hands with the person to your left for 2 rounds.
Let the group pose you like a statue and stay still for 1 minute.
Don't use your hands for the next round.
Drink a glass of water without using your hands.
Eat a snack without using your hands.
Let someone tickle your feet for 30 Seconds.
Smell everyone's breath and rate it.
Do an impression of another player.
Do an impression of a famous celebrity.
Act like a cat and meow.
Moo like a cow at random intervals.
Pretend to be a dog and fetch an object.
Let someone redo your hair or makeup.
Wear your socks on your hands for the next round.
Wear your shoes on the wrong feet.
Swap shirts with someone (if they agree).
Let someone mess up your hair completely.
Keep your eyes closed for the next 2 rounds.
Speak in rhymes for the next 3 minutes.
Don't say 'yes' or 'no' for the next round.
Don't show your teeth when laughing.
Have a staring contest with the person to your right.
Arm wrestle with the person to your left.
Have a thumb war with the person across from you.
Let someone paint one of your fingernails (with marker or polish).
Let the group decide a custom dare for you.
Reveal a secret you haven't told anyone here.
Tell an embarrassing story from your childhood.
Describe your first kiss in detail.
Say something nice about everyone in the room.
Let someone give you a wet willy.
Let someone slap your hand gently.
Pretend to swim on the floor.
Act like a fish out of water.
Roar at everyone like a lion.
Hiss like a snake at anyone who talks to you.
Slither on the floor like a snake.
Hop like a bunny around the room.
Jump like a frog across the room.
Pretend to be a car and make engine noises.
Act like a traffic cop and direct people.
Salute everyone who speaks to you.
Bow to everyone who speaks to you.
Curtsy to everyone who speaks to you.
Call everyone 'Your Majesty' for the next round.
Call everyone 'Master' or 'Mistress' for the next round.
Rap about the person to your right.
Pretend to be an opera singer.
Make up a poem about the game.
If you laugh in the next minute, do 10 pushups.
Keep a straight face while everyone tries to make you laugh.
Give a piggyback ride to someone.
Let someone carry you across the room.
Sit in a corner for 1 minute.
Stand in a corner facing the wall.
Wear a funny hat (or object as a hat).
Put a pillow under your shirt for the rest of the game.
Walk with a book on your head.
Balance a shoe on your head.
Throw and catch a grape/snack in your mouth.
Eat a raw onion slice (if available).
Drink a glass of water quickly.
Gargle water and try to sing a song.
Hold water in your mouth for 1 minute without swallowing.
Let someone make you a turban with a towel.
Tie your shoelaces together for 1 round.
Walk on your knees for the next turn.
Hide and let others find you.
Mime an action for others to guess.
Play charades for a word chosen by the group.
Let someone draw on your back and guess what it is.
Let someone blow in your ear.
Give a speech about why you are the best.
Give a speech about why you are the worst.
Apologize to everyone for no reason.
Pretend to be a news anchor.
Report on the 'weather' in the room.
Act like a fan of someone in the room.
Ask for an autograph from someone.
Pretend to fly around the room.
Make up a superhero name for yourself.
Make up superhero names for everyone.
Touch your nose with your tongue.
Clap your hands until they hurt (gently).
Pat your head and rub your tummy.
Speak with your tongue sticking out.
Hold your tongue with your fingers and speak.
Put a finger in your ear and speak.
Let someone sit on your back while you do a plank.
Let someone check your purse/wallet (excluding phone).
Let someone feed you water like a baby.
Let someone rock you like a baby.
Let someone sit on your feet while you do sit-ups.
Let someone hold your legs while you do a wheelbarrow walk.
Let someone guide you around the room while blindfolded.
Wear earplugs or headphones for 5 minutes.
Let someone whisper something in your ear.
Whisper a secret in someone's ear.
Let someone bite your finger gently.
Touch your nose with your toe.
Touch your head with your foot.
Put your leg behind your head.
Let someone hold your hand for the rest of the game.
Hold hands with the person opposite you.
Sit on the floor and stretch.
Let someone control your movements like a puppet.
Repeat the last word of every sentence.
Start every sentence with 'According to the prophecy...'.
End every sentence with '...and that's the truth'.
Clap after every word you speak.
Snap after every word you speak.
Stomp after every word you speak.
